website_summaries.verdict: The Harman Kardon AVR 2600 is a handsome 7.1 audiovisual receiver with a great GUI, but it's hard to recommend with its high price and comparatively lackluster performance.
cons: auto-setup was inaccurate in our test environment
missing advanced HDMI features like audio return channel and standby pass-through

customer_reviews.title: Love
customer_reviews.text: After 3 months of non stop use I must say I am very happy. The only thing I don't like is how it sounds with the EQ on. It might just be my speakers but it sounds much better off. I just tweak all the settings myself instead of letting the unit figure it out. Had for a month now. Truly awesome sound and interface through hdmi. Remarkable video processing/upgrading as well. But the sound is just so warm and full. Movies are best realized in 7.1 with a great sub. Would prefer better connections for my iPod but whatever, I'll spring for the dock at some point. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: M. Petersen

customer_reviews.title: Beware of "Protect"
customer_reviews.text: Ever single time I turn it on, the "Protect" lights up and I have to turn it on again and again. Plus my Subwoofer pops loud when you hit the Power button
customer_reviews.author: pbodys

customer_reviews.title: First One Died Already
customer_reviews.text: h/k quality ain't what it used to be. My first one of these died after just under a year - began making a thumping/snapping noise whenever you'd turn it on, then after a few months progressed to making repeated, fast pounding noises, like someone pounding on a door. Scared the living daylights out of me when it happened one time at 3AM. Since it was (barely) under warranty h/k mailed me a replacement which has worked alright so far, although it too has started "snapping" a bit when turned on. Waiting for the inevitable...
customer_reviews.author: sunspot42x

customer_reviews.title: Clarity, at last
customer_reviews.text: Ok, I went from a sony w/10% harmonic distortion @ 110watts per channel to this: 65w per channel @ .07% . Incredible difference! This made my klipsch speakers sound harsh with music. movies it was great. I sold the klipsch and bought infinitry and OMG! This reciever and infinity speakers is unbelievable! best stereo ever! I can't imagine how well its big brothers perform.
customer_reviews.author: Tone Seeker

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Works well but very difficult to use and set up. Need to be an IT person to do so.
customer_reviews.author: Julian Paiz

customer_reviews.title: Dealman123 used unit a lemon...
customer_reviews.text: Buyer beware...have purchased numerous re-manufactured units from Harmon Kardon over the years, but this one from "dealman123" purchased at the end of April 2014 lasted 4 weeks before it started powering off automatically after watch tv for an hour or so. Paid 300.00 and that was my first mistake.
customer_reviews.author: RC

customer_reviews.title: Great Mid range AVR
customer_reviews.text: Harman Kardon makes a great product for the average joe non audio-file. I bought this AVR to upgrade my system along with the new 3D TV and blu-ray. The hook up was very easy as was the set up. Great on screen menu. I have all of my components running through the AVR and one HDMI cable to the TV. The only issues I have with the AVR is that renaming the source is a little tough and you have to have the Bridge adapter to hook up your ipod/iphone to the AVR. Over all this unit performs as expected and sounds great.
customer_reviews.author: Tomas Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Not Happy with Harmon Kardon AVR 2600
customer_reviews.text: I had bought the Harmon Kardon AVR 2600 to replace an older Onkyo. I could never get the Harmon Kardon to sound as full as the Onkyo did. I did not have any electrical/integrating problems with it, it just didn't sound that good. I unloaded the Harmon Kardon AVR 2600 and replaced it with a Onkyo TXNR616. The Onkyo sounds so much nicer and fuller. Even the spouse noticed the difference.
customer_reviews.author: Biz

customer_reviews.title: harman Kardon AVR2600
customer_reviews.text: I love the Harman Kardon AVR2600. It is the hub of my home threater system. It was easy to install and hookup. The calibration system makes it ease to hookup all of your speakers.
customer_reviews.author: binman

customer_reviews.title: best receiver in the game
customer_reviews.text: I have bought alot of receiver in the past but by far this is the best, sounds great, just takes time trying to figure out. but its worth it enjoy
customer_reviews.author: bigdaddyx57

customer_reviews.title: love it
customer_reviews.text: i upgrade to 3D and my old harman kardon wasn't 3D compatible that's the only reason i replaced it but i like this one
customer_reviews.author: Larry H. Emard

customer_reviews.title: Avr 2600
customer_reviews.text: This AVR replaced the H/K 147 and i will say it is a big upgrade. The sound and power is fantastic! I setup this unit w/o the Ezsetup mic, it took awhile but is was worth it. This is my 4th H/K and they never have let me down! Great Product!
customer_reviews.author: Charles P. Hughes

customer_reviews.title: Great Receiver
customer_reviews.text: Previously owned the HK AVR 340 and Bridge I for 4 years. Bought this receiver as an open item with the Bridge III and this is a much needed upgrade! The set up is simple and is easy to configure new devices. The Bridge III allows onscreen use of iphone and ipads, etc. which was really lacking in the previous set up.
customer_reviews.author: HBO

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Very complete, good sound, easy to configure, better than other similar products, money well invested... Good seller. You get what you paid.
customer_reviews.author: JRbaCANO

customer_reviews.title: great product
customer_reviews.text: Our old system failed after 10 years . as a habit for all our purchases my son was looking for the best reviewed , and we picked this one. But i must say one thing: if i had to install it by myself, i would never bothered to buy something so complicated to connect to all our electronic devices. It took my son 5 hours to connect to the TV, the computer and program it. Eventually it works fine, good quality , and was worth the money for sure.
customer_reviews.author: AdamTomBar

customer_reviews.title: Best one yet!
customer_reviews.text: I've had a version of this for the last 15 years and Harman Kardon brings it every time. Well done!
customer_reviews.author: Skip Skipperton

customer_reviews.title: I had problems
customer_reviews.text: I had to return this product because I had problems with the 3D Bluray player. No picture on the Bluray. Harmon Kardon tech support is very nice but is NOT in the US. After a replacement unit I was able to get the 3D Bluray to work. Sounds great and looks good but not totally happy the unit.
customer_reviews.author: Super Dad

customer_reviews.title: It's Kikckn!
customer_reviews.text: This receiver is great! It drives my Nuance speakers great! I only have 3, but the it's great! I like the HDMI plugs too, it less wires and better clarity on TV and speakers from TV.
customer_reviews.author: F.D.

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended-- Poor build quality
customer_reviews.text: Not recommended.. Build quality is pretty poor despite having Harmon Kardon brand value.
customer_reviews.author: K G

customer_reviews.title: Excellent AV Reciever
customer_reviews.text: This is very good receiver from HK and very affordable price. Sound is lot better and crisp.I would recommend this product to anyone who is looking for quality product at a reasonable price from Harmon Kardon.
customer_reviews.author: Sonny

customer_reviews.title: AVR 2600  AUDIO  AND VIDEO PROBLEMS WITH BLUE RAY
customer_reviews.text: IF YOU ARE RUNNING HDMI AND HAVE A BLUE RAY PLAYER 3D COMPATIBLE DO NOT BUY THIS RECEIVER, HAS AUDIO AND VIDEO PROBLEMS WHEN RUNNING THE BLUE RAY PLAYER. THIS PARTICULAR MODELHAS A SOFTWARE UPGRADE AVAILABLE. IM IN THE PROCESS OF DOING THIS NOW. JUST A LOT OF AGGRAVATION FOR THE MONEY. THEY NEED TO MAKE THE BUYER AWARE OF THESE ISSUES.
customer_reviews.author: milton rogers

customer_reviews.title: HK Tech support needs to up the bar
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking receiver...though was little disappointed in not getting 5.1 and DTS from DVD when they contained it...Tried reaching HK Tech but surprised they are closed on weekends...though website states they are open on weekends.. Got to wait!
customer_reviews.author: spk

customer_reviews.title: Bought new --> Amazon sent used
customer_reviews.text: Great receiver, Good sound. I bought a new one. What I found was a scratched remote and all the front panels were installed. Did not bother to contact. At least receiver looks new.
customer_reviews.author: Mozart

customer_reviews.title: Avoid this Junk Receiver.
customer_reviews.text: If you apply the firmware update you will have a very expensive brick. Eight months out of warranty, bricked by HK's own software, and the only assistance I get from HK is the address of a service center where I must pay for repairs myself. No Thanks. Bought a Sony. Just google it to see how many people have had the hdmi board fail before and after the firmware upgrade.
customer_reviews.author: SteelersFan86

customer_reviews.title: Very good!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty Nice design, good sound and price. Have a 3D compatible system, and 7.1 or 5.1 setup option. It is a Harman Kardon
customer_reviews.author: Braulio R. Santos

product_meta.title: Harman/Kardon AVR2600 7 x 65W 7.1-Channel A/V Receiver (Discontinued by Manufacturer)
product_meta.description:
For more than 50 years, Harman Kardon products have been engineered to deliver the ultimate listening experience. That tradition continues with Harman Kardon's new AVR 2600 home theater receiver. High performance starts with a high-current, ultra-wide amplifier design which delivers uncomprimised realism and dynamics from your all your music and movies, including today's latest high-definition sources like Blu-ray. Connect your Blu-ray player to the AVR 2600 and it will play back the high-resolution Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio soundtracks with stunning detail. The AVR 2600 can even deliver an exciting 5.1 or 7.1 surround experience from sources that aren't in encoded in surround sound using proprietary Logic 7 processing. This includes an iPod or iPhone with the optional Bridge III dock for iPod.The AVR 2600 adds the latest sound processing technology from Dolby laboratories called Dolby Volume processing. Set your preferred volume once and Dolby Volume maintains that level across all your content no matter what source you happen to be listening. When it comes to video, the AVR 2600 sets the same performance standard that it does for audio. Using advanced Faroudja processing, video is upscaled to stunning 1080p resolution while display settings can be indpendently optimized by source for the best picture possible. Setting up and using the AVR 2600 couldn't be easier. A newly developed high-definition full-color on-screen menu system utilizes both pictures and text to guide you in setting up your home theater system while calibration and equalization is both easy and accurate with the included EzSet/EQ calibration system.

FROM THE MANUFACTURER
For more than 50 years, Harman Kardon products have been engineered to deliver the ultimate listening experience. That tradition continues with Harman Kardon's new AVR 2600 home theater receiver. High performance starts with a high-current, ultra-wide amplifier design which delivers uncomprimised realism and dynamics from your all your music and movies, including today's latest high-definition sources like Blu-ray. Connect your Blu-ray player to the AVR 2600 and it will play back the high-resolution Dolby TrueHD and DTS-HD Master Audio soundtracks with stunning detail. The AVR 2600 can even deliver an exciting 5.1 or 7.1 surround experience from sources that aren't in encoded in surround sound using proprietary Logic 7 processing. This includes an iPod or iPhone with the optional Bridge III dock for iPod.The AVR 2600 adds the latest sound processing technology from Dolby laboratories called Dolby Volume processing. Set your preferred volume once and Dolby Volume maintains that level across all your content no matter what source you happen to be listening. When it comes to video, the AVR 2600 sets the same performance standard that it does for audio. Using advanced Faroudja processing, video is upscaled to stunning 1080p resolution while display settings can be indpendently optimized by source for the best picture possible. Setting up and using the AVR 2600 couldn't be easier. A newly developed high-definition full-color on-screen menu system utilizes both pictures and text to guide you in setting up your home theater system while calibration and equalization is both easy and accurate with the included EzSet/EQ calibration system. HDMI with 3D firmware upgrade available now
feature_bullets: Dolby Volume maintains volume across all your content no matter what the source while also improving surround sound performance; HDMI with 3D firmware upgrade available now
High-current, ultra-wide-bandwidth amplifier generates 65Watts per channel for uncompromised realism
EzSet/EQ automates room-equalization and system-calibration for simple system setup and optimal audio quality
Optional Bridge III iPod dock allows playback of music and movies from your iPod, iTouch or iPhone in rich
Dolby True HD and DTS-HD Master Audio decoding delivers high-resolution sound from today's Blu-ray discs

specifications.Customer Reviews: 3.0 out of 5 stars47 ratings3.0 out of 5 stars
